titleStmt.title: The wonder, or, Propositions for a safe and well-grounded peace. Proposed by a Parliament man, full of honour, honesty, and satisfaction, and most worthy to be pursued, and embraced by all patriots and true-hearted Englishmen.
titleStmt.author: Anderson, Henry, b. 1581 or 2.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Henry Anderson by Wing.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
